description: Details pursuant to ref: 23/03426/FUL: Ecological Impact Assessment Verification (25) in respect of the redevelopment of the site involving demolition of all existing buildings/ structures with the erection of a building for B2 general industrial, B8 storage and distribution, and E(g)(iii) light industrial purposes with ancillary offices, together with associated car parking, servicing and landscape planting (revised scheme following withdrawal).
